apple.medical_details: Ripe green apples are rich in fiber and antioxidants, aiding digestion and boosting immunity while providing natural energy.

mandarine.medical_details: The Ripe oranges are rich in vitamin C, boost immunity, improve skin health, and support heart function while providing a refreshing citrus flavor.

rambutan.medical_details: Rambutan is rich in vitamin C, fiber, and antioxidants. It helps in boosting immunity and improving digestion.

pineapple.medical_details: Pineapple is packed with vitamin C and bromelain, which aids digestion, reduces inflammation, and supports immunity.

hard_kiwi.medical_details: Kiwi is high in vitamin C, vitamin K, and fiber. It promotes heart health, digestion, and improves skin health.

avocado.medical_details: Avocado is rich in healthy fats, fiber, and potassium. It supports heart health, improves digestion, and enhances brain function.

dragonfruit.medical_details: Dragon fruit is full of antioxidants, fiber, and vitamin C. It supports gut health, boosts immunity, and improves skin health.

papaya.medical_details: Papaya contains papain, vitamin C, and vitamin A. It aids digestion, boosts immunity, and promotes eye health.

mango.medical_details: Mango is high in vitamin C, vitamin A, and fiber. It enhances immunity, supports eye health, and improves digestion.

indian_strawberry.medical_details: Strawberries are rich in antioxidants, vitamin C, and fiber. They support heart health, boost immunity, and improve skin health.

grape.medical_details: Ripe grapes are rich in antioxidants, vitamin C, and resveratrol. They support heart health, improve brain function, and boost immunity.

guava.medical_details: Guava is packed with vitamin C, fiber, and antioxidants. It helps in digestion, boosts immunity, and supports heart health.

mabolo.medical_details: Mabolo, also known as velvet apple, is high in fiber, vitamin A, and iron. It promotes digestive health, improves vision, and supports red blood cell production.
